email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding the crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. We have a vessel, MV Ocean Star, available for this route. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The starting freight rate is $52.50 per metric ton. Laycan is 15-20 October. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit high for us. Would you consider coming down to the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, can we confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I understand your concern about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $51.25 per metric ton. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is set at $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $51.25 is acceptable. Can we confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October? Also, please send over the full charter party agreement for review. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $51.25 works for you. Yes, the laycan remains 15-20 October. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly for your review. Let me know if you need any clarifications. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, I’ve reviewed the charter party agreement, and everything looks in order. Let’s proceed with the booking. Please confirm the vessel’s availability and send over the final confirmation. Thanks for your help! Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent! I’ve confirmed the vessel’s availability, and MV Ocean Star is booked for your shipment. Attached is the final confirmation. Let me know if you need anything else. Looking forward to working together. Best, Sarah
